US says Hungarian sovereignty law gives 'draconian tools' to governmentA law passed in Hungary's parliament last week gives the government "draconian tools" to intimidate those with views not shared by the ruling party, the U.S. Statement Department said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 22:18:12 GMT ZPGPHLFTFBLNBI3ZOFZWJ4HG54 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/us-says-hungarian-sovereignty-law-gives-draconian-tools-government-2023-12-20/Kanishka Singh世界欧洲
Brazil Senate passes corporate tax discount reform to up revenueBrazil's Senate approved on Wednesday a bill to increase tax revenue that would prevent companies from using corporate tax discounts granted by states to reduce taxable income for federal government coffers. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 21:53:01 GMT F7OFV6YT7RIUBBVI6XMDPGOBVM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-senate-passes-corporate-tax-discount-reform-up-revenue-2023-12-20/Reuters世界美洲
Moldova to alter Soviet-era abbreviation for its airport, minister saysMoldova is to alter the three-letter international abbreviation for Chisinau airport, a government minister said on Thursday, a new bid to distance itself from its Soviet legacy and dependence on the Russian language. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 21:42:06 GMT 4H6PX4LGTZIJ5LFHOYU72Z3N4I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-alter-soviet-era-abbreviation-its-airport-minister-says-2023-12-20/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
North Korea's Kim warns of 'nuclear attack' if provoked with nukes -KCNANorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un said Pyongyang would not hesitate to launch a nuclear attack if an enemy provokes it with nuclear weapons, state media reported on Thursday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 21:26:38 GMT IAQUFNR72BJCRJOUMMR33S56JY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-koreas-kim-warns-nuclear-attack-when-enemy-provokes-it-with-nukes-kcna-2023-12-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
France prepared to change plans on 2024 Olympics opening based on securityFrance is prepared to move the 2024 Olympic opening ceremony from the River Seine to another location should the security situation require it, President Emmanuel Macron said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 21:24:42 GMT 56NWBSQKEVIBRDSVMSFDNTW7HY https://www.reuters.com/sports/france-prepared-change-plans-2024-olympics-opening-based-security-2023-12-20/Reuters运动的
Explainer: Who is Maduro ally Alex Saab, who was granted clemency in prisoner swap?U.S. President Joe Biden has decided to grant clemency to Alex Saab, an ally of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, as part of a deal in which Maduro's government released Venezuelans linked to the political opposition and 10 detained Americans. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 20:48:23 GMT 2W5OEFQDXRP6XI6CF43VC2ST4M https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/who-is-maduro-ally-alex-saab-who-was-granted-clemency-prisoner-swap-2023-12-20/Luc Cohen, Alexandra Ulmer世界美洲
Burkina Faso detains four French civil servants, says diplomatic sourceFour French IT workers with diplomatic passports and visas have been arrested in Burkina Faso's capital, Ouagadougou, a French diplomatic source said on Wednesday, denying a media report that they were intelligence agents. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:27:52 GMT WQY6AJSKSFLWZBGWCG7JR6TVHA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/burkina-faso-detains-four-french-civil-servants-says-diplomatic-source-2023-12-20/Reuters世界非洲
Riyadh reluctant to derail Iran detente over U.S. Red Sea taskforceSaudi Arabia's name was conspicuously - perhaps surprisingly - absent from a list of countries the United States announced as part of its new naval coalition protecting Red Sea shipping from Yemen's Houthi group. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:11:18 GMT 3LVCXRWKQFN4JIIZ7Z7USAXBCI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/riyadh-reluctant-derail-iran-detente-over-us-red-sea-taskforce-2023-12-20/Alexander Cornwell, Pesha Magid世界中东
Tunnels from Hamas leaders' homes found under Gaza City, Israel military saysIsraeli forces uncovered a network of tunnels running deep beneath central Gaza City from properties registered to Yahya Sinwar and other senior Hamas organizers of the Oct. 7 attacks on Israel, the military said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 18:21:27 GMT KOCBM2HJNJKKPBAG3LPEMQJUUE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/tunnels-hamas-leaders-homes-found-under-gaza-city-israel-military-says-2023-12-20/Reuters世界中东
Blinken says US wants Israel to shift to targeted operations in Gaza focusing on Hamas leadershipThe U.S. wants and expects Israel to shift its military operations in Gaza to a lower-intensity phase during which there will be more targeted operations focused on the Hamas leadership and its infrastructure, U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 18:11:25 GMT CRPWN6C5BZML3GL6O3FL6A5QBI https://www.reuters.com/world/blinken-says-us-wants-israel-shift-targeted-operations-gaza-focusing-hamas-2023-12-20/Humeyra Pamuk, Jonathan Landay世界
UN vote on Gaza aid delayed until Thursday as US talks to EgyptA United Nations Security Council vote on a bid to boost aid to the Gaza Strip has been delayed by another day, hinging on last-minute negotiations between the U.S. and Egypt over a proposal for U.N. aid monitoring as Washington seeks to avoid using its veto power, diplomats said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 17:41:14 GMT PRQKWMS2BROJ3KQVXXNZX3ZSOE https://www.reuters.com/world/un-vote-gaza-aid-further-delayed-us-works-intensely-2023-12-20/Michelle Nichols世界
